question: I am a 20 year old type 1 diabetic with an IV meth addiction that has taken the better part of 7 years. My diabetes care is poor at best but I don't check my bloodsugar enough to know for sure. Any information due to the complications it can cause as far as the 2 together are concerned. and any help resources I could tap into for help would be extremely appreciated as I am at the end of my rope.
title: meth addiction and diabetes
